type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let score = ref 0

  let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" &&

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in

let max = ref 0

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception")

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

exception ErrorCode of string

let max = ref 0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let rec digitsOfInt n = 
  let rec loop n acc =
    if n = 0 then acc
    else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
    match n with
      | 0 -> [0]
      | _ -> loop n []

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex ->

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"

                 "sample: digits 2"
    );

                 additivePersistence

                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3

    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 0 then []
  else
    let rec loop n acc =
      if n = 0 then acc
      else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
      match n with
        | 0 -> [0]
        | _ -> loop n []
;;

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4]

                 listReverse

                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"

  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl in
    helper [] l

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 0 then []
  else
    let rec loop n acc =
      if n = 0 then acc
      else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
      match n with
        | 0 -> [0]
        | _ -> loop n []

    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl in
    helper [] l

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 0 then []
  else
    let rec loop n acc =
      if n = 0 then acc
      else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
      match n with
        | 0 -> [0]
        | _ -> loop n []
;;

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

let rec digitalRoot n = 
  if sumList (digits n) > 9
  then digitalRoot (sumList (digits n))
  else sumList (digits n)
;;

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let listReverse l = 
  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl in
    helper [] l
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = listReverse [1; 2; 3; 4]
let _ = listReverse ["a"; "b"; "c"; "d"]


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;



(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = palindrome "myxomatosis"

let score = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in

      | Fail -> "[fail]"

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 0 then []
  else
    let rec loop n acc =
      if n = 0 then acc
      else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
      match n with
        | 0 -> [0]
        | _ -> loop n []

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 0 then []
  else
    let rec loop n acc =
      if n = 0 then acc
      else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
      match n with
        | 0 -> [0]
        | _ -> loop n []

  | [] -> 0
  | hd::tl -> 1 + mylength tl

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

  if sumList (digits n) > 9
  then digitalRoot (sumList (digits n))
  else sumList (digits n)
;;

let listReverse l = 
  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl 
  in helper [] l
;;

*)

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

  if n < 0 then []
  else
    let rec loop n acc =
      if n = 0 then acc
      else loop (n/10) (n mod 10::acc) in
      match n with
        | 0 -> [0]
        | _ -> loop n []
;;

  | hd::tl -> 1 + mylength tl

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    );

                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits

                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let digitsOfInt n =
  let rec digits n (mylength n) list =
    if n < 10 then n :: list
    else digits (n/10 + n mod 10) (mylength n/10 + n mod 10) list
  in digits n (mylength n) []

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

*)

let _ = additivePersistence 9876
let _ = additivePersistence 19

let rec digitalRoot n = 
  if sumList (digits n) > 9
  then digitalRoot (sumList (digits n))
  else sumList (digits n)
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = digitalRoot 9876


let listReverse l = 
  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl 
  in helper [] l
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = listReverse [1; 2; 3; 4]
let _ = listReverse ["a"; "b"; "c"; "d"]


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = palindrome "malayalam"
let _ = palindrome "myxomatosis"

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let digitsOfInt n =
  let rec digits n x list =
    if n < 10 then n :: list
    else digits (n/10 + n mod 10) (mylength n/10 + n mod 10) list
  in digits n (mylength n) []
;;

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"

  | hd::tl -> 1 + mylength tl
;;

  let y = log10 (float_of_int xs)
  in (int_of_float y) + 1

  let rec digits x l =
    let numdig = num_of_digits x in
      if numdig > 1
      then x/int_of_float(float_of_int 10 ** float_of_int (numdig -1)) mod 10 :: l
      else numdig :: l
  in digits n []
;;

  in helper n 1

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    );

                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome

                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let numdig = num_of_digits x in

| [] -> []

let num_of_digits xs =

let digitsOfInt n =
  let rec digits x l =
    let numdig = num_of_digits x in
    if numdig > 1
    then
      match l with
      | [] -> []
      | hd::tl ->
          ((x /
              (int_of_float
                 ((float_of_int 10) ** (float_of_int (numdig - 1)))))
             mod 10)
          :: (digits (x / 10) tl)
    else numdig :: l in
  digits n [];;

  in digits n []

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex ->

  | h::t -> h + sumList t 
;;

let rec mylength xs = match xs with
  | [] -> 0
  | hd::tl -> 1 + mylength tl
;;

let num_of_digits xs =
  let y = log10 (float_of_int xs)
  in (int_of_float y) + 1
;;
(*
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XX
*)

let digitsOfInt n =
  let rec digits x l =
    let numdig = num_of_digits x in
      if numdig > 1
      then match l with
        | [] -> []
        | hd::tl -> 
            x/int_of_float(float_of_int 10 ** float_of_int (numdig -1)) mod 10 :: 
            (digits (x/10) tl)
      else numdig :: l
  in digits n []
;;

let _ = digitsOfInt (-2)

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

let rec digitalRoot n = 
  if sumList (digits n) > 9
  then digitalRoot (sumList (digits n))
  else sumList (digits n)
;;

let listReverse l = 
  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl 
  in helper [] l
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = listReverse [1; 2; 3; 4]
let _ = listReverse ["a"; "b"; "c"; "d"]


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let digitsOfInt n =
  let rec digits x l =
    let numdig = num_of_digits x in
    if numdig > 1
    then
      match l with
      | hd::tl ->
          ((x /
              (int_of_float
                 ((float_of_int 10) ** (float_of_int (numdig - 1)))))
             mod 10)
          :: (digits (x / 10) tl)
    else numdig :: l in
  digits n [];;

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 10
  then [n]
  else
    (digitsOfInt (n / 10)) @
      [(n /
          (int_of_float
             ((float_of_int 10) ** (float_of_int ((num_of_digits n) - 1)))))
         mod 10];;

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

let _ = additivePersistence 19

let rec digitalRoot n = 
  if sumList (digits n) > 9
  then digitalRoot (sumList (digits n))
  else sumList (digits n)
;;

let _ = digitalRoot 9876


let listReverse l = 
  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl 
  in helper [] l
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = listReverse [1; 2; 3; 4]
let _ = listReverse ["a"; "b"; "c"; "d"]

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let _ = palindrome "malayalam"
let _ = palindrome "myxomatosis"

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 10 then n :: []
  else
    (digitsOfInt (n/10)) @ [n/int_of_float(float_of_int 10 ** float_of_int (num_of_digits n -1)) mod 10]
;;

let digitsOfInt n =
if n < 10 then n :: []
else
(digitsOfInt (n/10)) @ [n/int_of_float(float_of_int 10 ** float_of_int ((num_of_digits n) -1)) mod 10]
ocaml.min:
let digitsOfInt n =
  let rec digits x l =
    let numdig = num_of_digits x in
    if numdig > 1
    then
      match l with
      | hd::tl ->
          ((x /
              (int_of_float
                 ((float_of_int 10) ** (float_of_int (numdig - 1)))))
             mod 10)
          :: (digits (x / 10) tl)
    else numdig :: l in
  digits n [];;

let digitsOfInt n =
  if n < 10
  then [n]
  else
    (digitsOfInt (n / 10)) @
      [(n /
          (int_of_float
             ((float_of_int 10) ** (float_of_int ((num_of_digits n) - 1)))))
         mod 10];;

let num_of_digits xs =
  let y = log10 (float_of_int xs) in (int_of_float y) + 1;;

      [(n /
          (int_of_float
             ((float_of_int 10) ** (float_of_int ((num_of_digits n) - 1)))))
         mod 10];;

             mod 10)
          :: (digits (x / 10) tl)
    else numdig :: l in

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count

  in helper n 1

  let rec helper n = function
    | [] -> n
    | hd::tl -> helper (hd::n) tl 
  in helper [] l

*)

let explode s = 
  let rec go i = 
    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse (explode w) = explode w
  then true
  else false
;;

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis"

                 "sample: palindrome 2"

  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in

let additivePersistence n = 
  let rec helper n count =
    let rec digitalRoot n =
      if sumList (digits n) > 9
      then helper (sumList (digits n)) (count+1)
      else count
    in digitalRoot n
  in helper n 1
;;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
